entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning late this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
